backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles, custom tools, and conversation history with access control and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Report listing implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs for TTS and browser-support behaviors.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of one-line summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application root and main.tsx script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component wiring authentication, chat, speech, camera, settings, and TTS logic with history-aware auto-speak.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication and profile-setup gate that handles login flow and prompts for initial user name.
frontend/src/components/avatar/LiaAvatar: Avatar component displaying LIA's idle, listening, or speaking state with corresponding visuals and labels.
frontend/src/components/camera/CameraPan: Camera panel UI that controls starting, stopping, switching, and displaying camera video with error handling.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatView.ts: Chat interface that displays messages, handles input, speech features, and executes commands or tools on send.
frontend/src/components/chat/ClearHistor: Button with confirmation dialog to clear all chat history.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageBubb: Renders a single chat message styled differently for user and assistant.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Permi: Full-screen prompt requesting microphone permission with retry handling.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Settings dialog allowing TTS toggling, voice selection, and speech recognition language configuration.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolManage: Panel to add and list custom tools with form validation and backend integration.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCurrentUser.t: Hook providing current user identity, auth status, and logout logic.
frontend/src/hooks/chat/useConversationH: Manages local and backend-synced chat history with add and clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useCallerUser: Hook to load and save the caller user's profile information.
frontend/src/hooks/speech/useSpeechRecog: Hook wrapping browser speech recognition with state, transcript, and error management.
frontend/src/hooks/speech/useSpeechSynth: Provides a speech synthesis hook that loads voices, selects a preferred voice, restores saved settings, and exposes speak/stop functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFirstRunPermission: Checks if microphone permission is needed on first run and handles requesting and retrying permissions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook to manage authentication state, login, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalSettings.ts: Manages local user settings for recognition language, TTS voice, and TTS enablement, persisted in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, tools, and conversation history using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme color variables for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/tools/builtInTools.ts: Executes built‑in commands like search, open, YouTube, and help, using web search or opening URLs.
frontend/src/tools/commandParser.ts: Parses user text into structured commands including built-in and custom tool commands.
frontend/src/tools/customToolRunner.ts: Runs custom tool commands by building a URL from a template and opening it in a new tab.
frontend/src/tools/webSearch.ts: Provides a simple web search via DuckDuckGo’s API and returns structured search results.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routes), storing and retrieving them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, feature list, and architectural notes for the LIA voice‑assistant application.
